p: In the state of Illinois, Blacks/AA represent an estimated 14% of the total population but the CmI was 46%, n = 225. The population of Blacks/AA in Chicago is 29% but the mortality from COVID-19 was 70% ( n = 132). Blacks/AA comprise 32% of the Louisiana state population but represented 71% ( n = 495) of the total deaths ( n = 702). The Black/AA in Michigan constitute 14% of the total population but the mortality was 53% ( n = 430).
